thread.title: In the Beginning Was the Word

author: Barton Swaim
title: In the Beginning Was the Word
text:
Many American Christians across the ideological spectrum, perhaps the large majority, seem to believe that Christianity must have a distinctive political expression. Liberal Christians think their liberalism is a natural expression of their Christian faith, and conservative Christians think the same of their conservatism.
This belief wasn’t always so pervasive. Up until the 1960s, it was Protestant liberals, not evangelicals, who fused their faith with left-liberal political ideologies. Many influential liberal Protestants—the...
